about_paragraph1: 🎓 UNIVO is an AI-powered learning platform designed for university students to improve their academic journey through gamified modules, smart XP systems, and interactive content.
about_paragraph2: 🚀 It transforms traditional learning into a more engaging experience through quizzes, exercises, and adaptive recommendations.
vision_text: To revolutionize the way students learn by becoming the leading AI-powered learning companion. We envision a future where education is not just accessible, but also adaptive and joyful — tailored uniquely to every learner's pace, style, and curiosity. UNIVO strives to integrate smart analytics, personalized modules, and engaging content that empower students to take control of their academic growth with confidence and excitement.
mission_text: Our mission is to transform traditional learning into a dynamic, interactive journey. By providing quizzes, gamified XP systems, exercises, personalized AI recommendations, and badge-based motivation, we aim to support every student in unlocking their full potential. UNIVO is committed to creating a fun, motivating, and inclusive environment that keeps learners engaged — anytime, anywhere, on any device.
dashboard_error: An error occurred while loading the dashboard.
quiz_selection_info: 📌 Note: Each quiz can only be <u>taken once</u>. You will earn XP based on correct answers 🎯

learnhub_selection_info_box: 📚 LearnHub offers learning content and exercises in every module. You can track your progress, close gaps in your knowledge and deepen your understanding with interactive materials.

quiz_selection_description: 📚 Here you will find all available quizzes for your learning modules. Test your knowledge and earn XP to track your progress. 📌 Note: Each quiz can only be taken once. Your score determines how much XP you earn. 🎯
